channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [DERBY-905] derbyall nightly failure in LOBTest running under DerbyNetClient - jdk131 specific
item.description:
The following nightly regression happened in the 1/27 codeline, it also failed on 1/20 but worked on 1/13.

      • Start: LOBTest jdk1.3.1_15 DerbyNetClient derbynetmats:jdbcapi 2006-01-29 05:59:59 ***

item.summary: derbyall nightly failure in LOBTest running under DerbyNetClient - jdk131 specific

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
